item.description:
About this Meetup Group

Trip to Guinea, Africa

For all those interested in learning about our Trip to Guinea in July 2010 with Sayon Camera, Mamady Kourouma, Sire Diallo Konate and more, come Saturday April 3rd! With slides and uplifting discussion, we will give you a lot of insight into what will happen on a trip like this.

You will hear and see all of the experiences of trips past and how we do what we do! You will be impressed and we hope you will eventually join us on this trip.

Perfect for educators, students, musicians and non-musicians.

Refreshments will be served.

Doors open at 3:45PM Plan on a 1.5 to 2 hour event!
FREE

Hope to see you there.

In rhythm spirit,
Alan Tauber, Director

Trip To Africa

The DrumConnection
781.648.0066 office
617.686.6080 cell
item.how_to_find_us: We'll welcome you at the door! ...and make sure you are very comfortable.

group.name: Africa Travel Group! Learn Drumming & Dance in Guinea!

item.name: Trip to Guinea! Drum, Dance and Sing this July 2010!
